title: 3 gig update?
body:
What the what now?

I played league just before the new urgot dropped and now my client is downloading over 3 gig just for the Urgot update?

What's up with that?

replies.body: To be honest, I don't know but possibly hidden stuff?{{champion:6}}

> [{quoted}](name=LukeSwagwalker4,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RdZqdEGv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-27T07:15:21.767+0000)
>
> To be honest, I don't know but possibly hidden stuff?{{champion:6}}

So you got it too?
Thought my client was having errors with files.

Hi Reindin, this patch was a little bit larger than normal but it was not 3GB, it just has a funky way of displaying total patch "size". See [this post](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion-en/AdF7xEup-patch-715-size?comment=0000) for details.

I got this too. In fact it was really sneaky with me... It told me it was only 250MB, but it took *ages*, so I checked my system storage settings and *BAM!* 3.01GB.... Honestly Riot, what are you hiding??????
